title: Gerard and Bertha Find Sustenance at a Hermitage
description: Gerard and Bertha Find Sustenance at a Hermitage; Loyset Liédet (Flemish, active about 1448 - 1478), and Pol Fruit (Flemish, active about 1468); Illuminated: Bruges, Belgium; written 1463 - 1465; illuminated 1467 - 1472; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment; Leaf: 22.7 x 18.4 cm (8 15/16 x 7 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 6, leaf 5; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
